name: XCL Property Management
details: Website for XCL Management showcasing their office properties across Orland Park, IL, with easy navigation for current and future tenants to explore locations and connect.

name: Rebie's Bakery
details: Custom website for independent business Rebie's Bakery to display their creations, share the menu options, and connect with customers.

name: Git Repo Tracker
details: A React website built for developers that takes a public git URL and visualizes all commits, branches, and details from the repo. Allows users to download commit details in their preferred data format.

name: Helayna Fuller Photography
details: Portfolio site for freelance photographer Helayna Fuller to showcase her work and connect with prospective clients.
